|dykdate=21 March 2008 |dykentry=...that in 1964, units of '''[[No. 81 Wing RAAF]]''' were deployed to [[Darwin, Northern Territory]] as contingency in the event of an air attack on [[Australia]] during the [[Indonesia-Malaysia confrontation|Indonesiaâ€“Malaysia confrontation]]? |currentstatus=GA |topic=war }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WPAVIATION|class=GA}} {{WPMILHIST|class=A|A-Class=pass|Aviation=y|ANZSP=y|WWII=y|Cold-War=y}} {{WP Australia|class=GA|importance=Low|military=y|military-importance=Low}} }}
== RAAF Base Darwin or RAAF Station Darwin == What was the name for RAAF Base Darwin in 1964 when the squadron was based there? [[User:Ozdaren|Ozdaren]] ([[User talk:Ozdaren|talk]]) 10:47, 26 April 2010 (UTC) :It was RAAF Base Darwin. They were called RAAF Stations from the mid-1930s until around 1952 and thereafter RAAF Bases. Cheers, [[User:Ian Rose|Ian Rose]] ([[User talk:Ian Rose|talk]]) 11:02, 26 April 2010 (UTC) ::Thanks I was trying to figure out when the change occurred, I couldn't find a reference anywhere for it. I had assumed it was around the time of the Vietnam War (the US influence). [[User:Ozdaren|Ozdaren]] ([[User talk:Ozdaren|talk]]) 01:43, 27 April 2010 (UTC) :::My concrete ref for the timing is a tiny bit oblique. Derek Roylance's ''Air Base Richmond'' (1991) lists all commanders of the base. They're listed under "RAAF Station Richmond" until 1952, at which point it becomes "Headquarters Richmond", and an additional list starts up for commanders of "Base Squadron". Somewhere else I've seen that all "stations" changed to "bases" around this time as well, I just can't find it right now... ;-)Cheers, [[User:Ian Rose|Ian Rose]] ([[User talk:Ian Rose|talk]]) 07:35, 27 April 2010 (UTC)
== Mel Hepfeld == The Air Power Development Centre has made a slight error/typo in regard to Hepfeld's service. Hepfeld is the current Air Commander Australia, having been appointed to the position on promotion to air vice marshal in February 2012 (see his Defence [http://www.airforce.gov.au/Our_People/Our_Leaders/Air_Commander_Australia/?RAAF-NobGotDDyuO+rDXqTQ/8ce4kHNl59b+g bio]). The years given, 2009–12, were the years he headed Air Combat Group. Figured I'd best leave the tweaking to you, [[User:Ian Rose|Ian]]. ;) Cheers, [[User:Abraham, B.S.|Abraham, B.S.]] ([[User talk:Abraham, B.S.|talk]]) 08:38, 1 April 2013 (UTC) :Tks mate, glad you're keeping an eye on things -- I'll look after it. Did you let APDC know? If not I'm happy to... Cheers, [[User:Ian Rose|Ian Rose]] ([[User talk:Ian Rose|talk]]) 09:16, 1 April 2013 (UTC) ::Cheers Ian. Admitedly I have been a little slack and haven't emailed APDC about it. But if you wouldn't mind that would be excellent, thanks. [[User:Abraham, B.S.|Abraham, B.S.]] ([[User talk:Abraham, B.S.|talk]]) 06:21, 5 April 2013 (UTC)
